articles.description: Gigi is one of the highest-profile examples of people walking away from the platform following Elon Musk's recent acquisition.

articles.description: The Albert Hall was spellbound as she made these classic songs her own. Strangely, the acoustic set now feels more risky than the electric
articles.content: For her first ever concert at the Royal Albert Hall, American singer-songwriter Chan Marshall (who performs as Cat Power, the name of her first band) decided to recreate Bob Dylans near-legendary 196… [+1508 chars]

articles.title: Joan Collins, 89, looks unrecognisable after ditching her big hair for new sleek and straight look - Daily Mail
articles.description: Best known for oozing Hollywood glamour wherever she goes, Dame Joan, 89, ditched her signature big, voluminous hair for a just as gorgeous straight style.
articles.content:
Dame Joan Collins looks unrecognisable in her sleek and straight new hair do while out for a fancy dinner with friends.

articles.title: Glastonbury Festival ticket sale hit by technical issue - BBC
articles.description: Festival organisers apologised for the problem and announced a ticket resale in spring 2023.
articles.content:
A "technical problem" has led to difficulties for some people trying to buy tickets for next year's Glastonbury Festival.
